QuestData.Title: Trelane's Defenses
QuestData.Description: All rested?$B$BHere's our next step: there're ogres all around the Tower of Arathor in Stromgarde. We're gonna need to ward you against the tower's defenses. To do that, we're gonna need some gems the Boulderfist shaman have taken a liking to. They took 'em from the tower, but they're not gonna stay in their possession for long.$B$BGet one of them gems an' bring 'em to Kryten--he knows the spell to enchant it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find an Azure Agate and bring it to Apprentice Kryten at Stromgarde Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: $n, hello again. Have you found an azure agate yet?
QuestData.RewardText: You amaze me, $n. Well done again.$B$BGive me a moment to cast the proper spell an' you'll be ready.
